item.description:
"If you understand that you are Ten Bodies, and you are aware of those Ten Bodies, and you keep them in balance, the whole universe will be in balance with you."   Yogi Bhajan

Join us this Monday May 14th from 7-9pm ...  Learn some easy, practical techniques of Kundalini Yoga using mantra, meditation and breath to develop and activate all Ten Bodies ...

BE YOU!

We have 1 physical, 3 mental, and 6 energy bodies. Expand your human caliber - learn to strengthen and balance the Ten Bodies and access powerful capacities of the psyche.

See you Monday!!

jasdeep@me.com  860-990-4717

$20 pre reg         $25 day of
item.how_to_find_us: 949 Main St. South Glastonbury CT 06073 (South Congregational Church Social Hall) 860-990-4717 jasdeep@me.com
item.name: Kundalini Yoga Workshop & Gong Meditation "The Ten Bodies"
